pages.text: $(li)Leafcutter Ants are neutral creatures that can be found in the Jungle.$(br)$(li)They will harvest Leaf for the near trees for their colonies.

$(li)If you break a Leafcutter Anthill a Leafcutter Ant Queen will appears.$(br)$(li)This is a biggest and strongest version of the common worker Ant.$(br)$(li)Ant Queens may drop Leaftcutter Ant Pupa on death.
